fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Revoke a player's permission to return to the realm of the living at night. They may no longer be voted during the Revival Meeting.
- Cancel the next Revival Meeting at night. No meeting will be held in the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have access to the dead chat.
- On every day besides D1, you will host a Revival Meeting in the dead chat. All dead players, and you, may vote for each other to decide someone to revive. That player is revived at the beginning of the next night, and cannot be lynched during the next morning.
- You have two votes during this meeting.
- Your attributes will remain active and your abilities can still be used while you're dead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See at least 5/6 of the players in the game enter the graveyard at some point.
